gap1_education.finding: Significant education effect on AI adoption readiness
gap1_education.interpretation: Higher education associated with greater AI readiness

gap3_experience.finding: Small but significant experience effect with inverted-U pattern
gap3_experience.interpretation: Mid-career professionals most ready to adopt AI

gap4_disability.finding: Respondents with disabilities report higher AI anxiety
gap4_disability.implication: Accessibility and inclusive design needed for AI deployment

gap5_tool_preferences.finding: ChatGPT users show higher scores vs MS Copilot users
gap5_tool_preferences.interpretation: Consumer-friendly ChatGPT interface may drive stronger perceptions
